quotes.Title: Matthew 12:50
quotes.desc: For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.

quotes.Title: Matthew 4:19
quotes.desc: Come, follow me, and I will send you out to fish for people.

quotes.Title: John 14:6
quotes.desc: I am the way and the truth and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.

quotes.Title: Matthew 6:34
quotes.desc: Do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about itself. Each day has enough trouble of its own.

quotes.Title: Matthew 5:10
quotes.desc: Blessed are those who are persecuted because of righteousness, for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.

quotes.Title: Matthew 19:14
quotes.desc: Let the little children come to me, and do not hinder them, for the kingdom of heaven belongs to such as these.

quotes.Title: Matthew 5:16
quotes.desc: In the same way, let your light shine before others, that they may see your good deeds and glorify your Father in heaven.
